CustomField.description: Did the case owner used a direct voice or video communication tool
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Communication_Channels__c, "Phone"), 1, IF(INCLUDES(Communication_Channels__c, "Go To Meeting"),1, IF(INCLUDES(Communication_Channels__c, "Google Meet"), 1, IF(INCLUDES(Communication_Channels__c, "Go to Assist"), 1, IF(INCLUDES(Communication_Channels__c, "Other Video/Phone Bridge"), 1 ,0) ))))
CustomField.label: Used Phone
